"Marimo": "If you change your perspective, even the scenery you look at every day can leave a different impression, you know?"
"For example, looking down from a high place. You might make some new discoveries, yes?"
"Thank you for the help earlier! I was able to use that data to continue my investigation."
"Just like Bergmann said, you're very reliable!"
"Ah, Bergmann is something of a mentor for me; he's an ARKS from Aelio who loves mountain climbing."
"He showed me all sorts of places, and he's taught me many things."
"As a result, I started to really enjoy sightseeing, and now I work in environmental research."
"...Anyways, I digress. Actually, there's another place I'd like you to visit, yes?"
"This time I want you to go to Dreisen Plant."
"You will get data from the place I specified, yes?"
"I see... Let me know when you have some time, yes?"
"How have things been for you in Stia?"
"Personally, the scope of my investigation has widened, so each day is very busy, you know?"
"There are still many places I'd like to look into, so I've got to give it my all."
"Actually, I would appreciate more your help, if you wouldn't mind. What do you say?"
"This time, I'd like to ask that you look into the lava waterfalls in Outer Mediola: Sector 2."
"Please take care not to fall into the lava, yes?"
"That's too bad... Well, I'll be looking forward to your next visit."
